comment.author: 59573650@N06
comment._content:
Fun place..Bunratty Castle...they have dinners every night with Irish singers and story
tellers.  Next door that low house is now Durty Nellie's which is a pub and restaurant
and a must to visit.  It is a fun place and if you want a peaceful dinner, then go to the
second floor which is over the bar and it is much quieter.  The food is excellent and
we eat there every trip as it is on the road to the Airport.  There are also now shops
next to Durty Nellie's and then down the road are some excellent ones featuring all
items made in IReland.  I have purchased many things there.
